Title: Attention
Description:
Your next test also involves concentration and attention. I want you to practice your abilities on the training bags in the pit below.

The bags are hung in groups of two. When I call out "Left", attack the bag on the left. When I call out "Right", attack the bag on the right.

If you fail to follow my simple directions, this task will become much harder.

Now beat on those practice bags until they burst, $n.
ObjectivesText: Destroy 2 Training Bags. Follow Instructor Xann's instructions to determine which bags to attack.
RewardText:
You may not be a full-time trainee here, but do not let that keep you from learning anything.

I can assure you, the ability to quickly switch targets will prove valuable in future fights.
